# 2 {#sec-02}

You decide not to sit down in the seat. You don’t really want to, nor do you see any purpose to this act, so you remain standing. 

The spheres seem to shrug, although they have no shoulders. One of them heads over to the control panel. 

Suddenly, the spacecraft accelerates! You weren’t expecting this. 

The sudden acceleration slams you headfirst into the wall. You die on impact, your neck broken and your skull fractured.
